feed.title: Battle of BC
feed.subtitle: The UBC Esports Association and EndGameTV are excited to announce the return of Battle of BC! This is the third instalment of the largest major Super Smash Brothers tournament in Western Canada. Players from around the globe will be competing in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate and Super Smash Bros. Melee at the University of British Columbia in beautiful Vancouver, Canada. The tournament has historically featured heavy hitters such as Mew2King, MKLeo, Leffen, Hugs, Amsa, Void, and Mike Haze.
